General.Name: Vivid Games S.A
General.Description: Vivid Games S.A. develops and produces mobile games in Europe. The company offers Real Boxing series game. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Bydgoszcz, Poland.

1.Name: Mr. Jaroslaw  Wojczakowski
1.Title: Co-Founder, CEO & Pres of the Management Board
